entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 01:05 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -17.1°C
Wind: N 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16 except minus 19 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 16 except minus 19 inland. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries in onshore winds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Overcast. Low minus 15 except minus 19 inland.
entry.summary: Overcast. 40 percent chance of flurries in onshore winds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15 except minus 19 inland. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
